about_the_game:
The official soundtrack for Nonsensical Video Generator. Included are the main menu themes, sound effects, and other tracks.
These artists are attributed for their contributions to this soundtrack:
  • KiwifruitDev (This is Nonsense!)
  • Bobby I Guess (A Nonsensical Song, A Nonsensical Song Yet Again, Creation, Mystery, Bug Crusher, Where We Began, Halloween, Jazzy)
  • GMM2003 (Sound Effects)

name: Nonsensical Video Generator Soundtrack
short_description: The official soundtrack for Nonsensical Video Generator.
